title: Enforcer Police Crime Action-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Enforcer: Police Crime Action (c) Merge Games
Release Date: 10/2014 Protection: STEAM
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

While on duty youll need to remain ever vigilant and question any
suspicious behaviour to protect your small American town from a rising
criminal threat. Off duty youll need to visit friends, family and live
life to its fullest. Your actions while at work and home affect your
stress levels. If you spend too much time fighting crime, you will be
under severe pressure that will affect your ability to uphold the law

For more infos go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/318220/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
copy crack from CODEX dir to your installdir
Run setup.exe and install
Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014


System Requirements:

OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 
Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512 MB memory 
DirectX: Version 9.0 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
